meanings.definition: A strap or band worn around the belly to support clothing
meanings.sent1: She wore a bellyband to keep her pants up.
meanings.sent2: The bellyband held his trousers in place.
meanings.sent3: The bellyband was like a loyal friend, always keeping her outfit intact.
meanings.sent4: His bellyband was a trusty companion, never letting his pants fall.
meanings.sent5: The bellyband was a lifesaver, preventing any wardrobe malfunctions.

meanings.definition: A band of material used to secure a book or magazine around the middle
meanings.sent1: He used a bellyband to keep his notebook closed.
meanings.sent2: The magazine was held together by a bellyband.
meanings.sent3: The bellyband on the book was like a stylish belt.
meanings.sent4: The bellyband wrapped around the journal like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The bellyband on the novel added a touch of elegance.

meanings.definition: A band of material used to secure a diaper on a baby
meanings.sent1: The bellyband kept the diaper snug on the baby.
meanings.sent2: She fastened the diaper with a bellyband.
meanings.sent3: The baby giggled as the bellyband secured the diaper in place.
meanings.sent4: The bellyband was like a gentle hug around the baby's waist.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bellyband added a cheerful touch to the diaper change.
